title: Authenticating Log In, Loading after Champion Select
body:
On average it takes 3 attempts to Authenticate when I Log In before it loads the landing page.

It takes usually 3-4 attempts to reconnect after Champion Select to load the Client. If this fails I have to close the client and start from the desktop again.
This just started happening after 7.13

what gives?




After discovering that my DNS Resolver was default to GoogleDNS and was pinging Mountain View, California I changed my TCP/IP settings on my Wired Location Connection from GoogleDNS to OpenDNS..

Google DNS

Preferred: 8.8.8.8
Alternate: 8.8.4.4

OpenDNS

Preferred: 208.67.222.222
Alternate: 208.67.220.220

And the game loaded immediately. If anybody else comes across a similar issue.. try that aforementioend changed. I will report back if it stays as a resolution.

replies.body:
Weeeeiiiiiiird......TBH I'm really not sure why your client would have been pinging Mountain View, CA as we don't currently have any servers located there.

Switching to the Google DNS helps a lot since that will force your connection to be routed in a different way, so good step there!
Just a quick review of the Network Logs, in the ping.txt file..   why in the hell is my client pinging Mountain View, California???  I mean for fuck's sake, I live in North Carolina...
